features: HANDMADE & UNIQUE Each 100% Cotton Accent Cushion is unique as they are handmade, and no two will look the same. Each dye lot can vary, there may be slight variation in color between pieces. The color of the final product may vary slightly from this image
MIX & MATCH They work very well individually, or as part of your very own unique pattern mix. All designed to bring texture and color to your home.
RETAINS SHAPE & PLUMPNESS High-density polyester filling insert included. Hidden zipper closure. Shell can be machine wash on gentle cycle; tumble dry low.

description: The cushions from our Home Collection are truly stunning, with different natural shades combining to create a statement piece.These soft and textured handmade cushions are ethically produced in India with a mix of carefully chosen premium cotton and linen. They work very well individually, or as part of your very own unique pattern mix. All designed to bring texture and color to your home. They include a discreet hidden zip providing easy removal when needed. Each cushion is unique as they are handmade, and no two will look the same. Subtle and neutral for modern or traditional homes or work-spaces, all pieces from this collection will compliment a wide range of color schemes in living rooms, bedrooms and patio spaces.
